page.title: 09FARMING IN SANDBACH
page.content: THE NUMBER OF SHEEP IN THE AREA HAS INCREASED IN RECENT YEARS BUT ON SOME FARMS SHEEP KEEPING IS PURELY SEASONAL MANY OF THE FARMERS TAKE IN SHEEP FOR THE WINTER MONTHS WHICH HAVE SPENT THE SUMMER IN THE PEAK DISTRICT. SOME OF THE SMALL HOLDINGS CONCENTRATE ON {MARKET-GARDENING}GROWING ALL TYPES OF VEGETABLES AND SALAD PRODUCE. SOME OF THE SMALL HOLDINGS SELL THEIR PRODUCE DIRECTLY TO THE PUBLIC EITHER AT A SMALL FARM SHOP OR IN TRAVELLING GREEN-GROCER VANS. HOWEVER, ONE OF THE LARGE 40 ACRE MARKET GARDENS SELLS TO THE VEGETABLE STALLS ON SANDBACH {MARKET.}IVY COTTAGE FARM,A SMALL 10 ACRE FARM CONCENTRATES ON{TURKEY}AND {CHICKEN}FARMING. 15,000 TURKEYS AND 2,000 CHICKENS PASS THROUGH THEIR HANDS EACH YEAR. ANOTHER SMALL HOLDING REARS PIGS AND CALVES TO SELL AT BEESTON MARKET.
